rules.description: Miryoku: Home Row Mods - Left Hand (CAGS)
Miryoku: Home Row Mods - Right Hand (CAGS reverse)

manipulators.description: Layer Lock: Clear all layer locks on Escape
SYM Layer: H -> TO_MOUSE (switch to mouse layer)
NUM Layer: H -> TO_NAV (switch to nav layer)
NUM Layer: l -> . (period - for decimal numbers)
NAV Layer: M -> CAPS_WORD (toggle caps lock)
NAV Layer: C -> TO_NUM (switch to num layer)
MOUSE Layer: C -> TO_SYM (switch to sym layer)
MOUSE Layer: Left Thumb -> Right Click
MOUSE Layer: Center Thumb -> Left Click
MOUSE Layer: Right Thumb -> Middle Click
MEDIA Layer: M -> OUT_TOGGLE (Audio Output Switch)
MEDIA Layer: C -> TO_FUN (switch to function layer)
FUN Layer: G -> SLCK (Scroll Lock - F14)
FUN Layer: H -> TO_MEDIA (switch to media layer)
FUN Layer: Left Thumb -> APP (Menu Key)
